steps.text: Kill Hillock
Check Nessa / Tarkleigh for your links, gems and movement speed boots
Go Through `The Coast` and get the waypoint
Continue onwards to `The Mud Flats`
substeps: Head into `The Submerged Passage` and grab the waypoint

steps.text: Take that Waypoint back to `The Coast` and proceed to `The Tidal Island`
Kill Hailrake
Check Nessa / Tarkleigh for your Links, Gems and movement Speed boots (again)
substeps: **Don't forget your movement ability for 2nd Tarkleigh Reward and Quicksilver from Nessa**

steps.text: Go back to Submerged Passage until you find the Bridge
Go through `The Ledge` and through `The Climb` until you reach the waypoint in the `Lower Prison`
Take that waypoint back to town and enter your portal from earlier (to the `Submerged Passage`).
Find `The Flooded Depths` and go kill the mini-boss Crab
Check Nessa / Tarkleigh for any missing Links, Gems and movement Speed boots (again)
substeps: Also grab your Skill point from Tarkleigh

steps.text: Head back to `The Lower Prison` and find your Trial of ascendancy, complete it and keep going towards `The Upper Prison`
Find and Kill Brutus
substeps: Prioritize picking up Rare items since they sell for more Alteration Shards when identified, compared to magic items

steps.text: Pick up upgraded Movement Ability from Tarkleigh
substeps: Check Nessa / Tarkleigh for your Links, Gems and movement Speed boots

steps.text: Take the waypoint to `Prisoner's Gate` and head over to `The Ship Graveyard`
Find the Waypoint for `The Ship Graveyard`, it`s typically very close to the entrance
Find and enter `The Ship Graveyard Cave`
substeps: Rush the zone and find the Allflame

steps.text: Come out of the Cave and keep going until you find the entrance to `The Cavern of Wrath`
Take the waypoint from `The Cavern of Wrath` back to `The Ship Graveyard` waypoint and find Fairgraves
Kill Fairgraves
Talk to Bestel for your Skillpoint
substeps: Have another quick look for any missing Links or movement speed boots from Tarkleigh

steps.text: Take your waypoint back to `The Cavern of Wrath` and make your way to Merveil
Kill Merveil
Prioritize picking up Rare items once again
substeps: Also Prioritize boots; early movement speed feels really good!
